alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Marion; Panola (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 10:24AM CST until January 18 at 11:15AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1115 AM CST. * At 1023 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Vivian to 7 miles northeast of Carthage, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Vivian, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Benton, Plain Dealing, Oil City, Mooringsport, Hosston, Belcher, Gilliam, Deberry, Elysian Fields, Alden Bridge, Spring Ridge, Cross Lake, Cavett and Leigh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CST for northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas.
